aboutText1: Hello World, my name is Matheus Patriota. I am a student of the Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering at the IFPE Belo Jardim campus and currently works as a Software Engineer for Kunumi, focusing on Front-End development using React.js, a company focused on developing solutions for companies.
aboutText2: In my free time I create content to help other people who want to follow the path of technology, an area I'm passionate about, if you need help or feel lost, let's talk, maybe I can help you too, right!? ðŸ˜‰
